column5: Had a great trip out of Little Canada Camp on the English River near Ear Falls. Caught lots of fat walleyes, the biggest was 24". Lots of pike on crankbaits, but the biggest was only 30". A fair amouint of jumbo perch 12-15'. Jiggs tipped with minnows/leeches were the go to baits.http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/...01021426-2.jpg
Thanks for sharing your report...I just booked a trip to Lake Salveson today, located on the English/Sturgeon river.
